::Firearm::

Firearm hears some animal sounds coming from above and looks up to 
see Prowl, and Nightstrike firing at him. He transforms back into 
robot mode and activates his jetpack, flying up and firing 20 rapid 
fire shots from his arm cannon at Nightstrike.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm/Autofire::
> 
> Firearm continues to drive toward Predator, firing two missiles at
> him, and seeing another bot firing at him too. He turns, looking for
> another target.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Autofire frowns, waiting for Dark Scream to respond. He wondered how
> long he'd have to wait here.
